name: com.cortexpowered.apps.editorial-content
description: This application displays editorial images from a set of RSS feeds. The application will work offline if it is configured to cache content.
author: Cortex

parameters.name: cortex.editorial.view.feeds
parameters.description: A space separated list of RSS feeds.

parameters.name: cortex.editorial.view.duration
parameters.description: The duration an editorial image will be shown on screen in milliseconds.

parameters.name: cortex.editorial.view.orientation
parameters.description: The orientation of editorial images. Can be 'portrait' or 'landscape'

parameters.name: cortex.editorial.content.ttl
parameters.description: The duration an editorial image will get cached in milliseconds.

parameters.name: cortex.editorial.feed.ttl
parameters.description: The duration an editorial RSS feed will get cached in milliseconds.

parameters.name: cortex.editorial.feed.refreshInterval
parameters.description: Refresh interval of an RSS feed in milliseconds.
